ygData.subject: Re: Another lag question
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve never seen this either - if it happens again - I d definitely /bug it to Verant.  They ve told us that what they describe as a game server is really a
ygData.messageBody:
I've never seen this either - if it happens again - I'd definitely "/bug" it
to Verant. They've told us that what they describe as a game server is
really a "farm" of server boxes. My guess is that they had a problem on one
of their boxes - or their internal network containing the boxes. They've
also mentioned they have multiple zones per box - so if it was load based -
it could have been caused by another zone that shares the same box as
Mistmoore...

Slyde

----- Original Message -----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 4:05 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Another lag question


> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> (This is a repost. Several messages I've sent after I sent this one have
> already come back so think this one may have gotten lost in cyberspace)
>
> Last night I was in Mistmoore at 9PM Hawaii time. Thats 3 AM EST. When I
> logged on, there were less than 15 people in the zone. The entire time I
> was in Mistmoore, my packet loss percentage never went below 25%. A
> guildmate was also in MM and I asked if they were having problems as well.
> They stated they weren't having any problems and suggested I quit the game
